lines: LET THE LOWER LIGHT BE BURNING
1. Uluse lwakwa Shikulu, Lulabeka nshiku pe;
Atupa kasunge nyali pa cabu ca cimana.
Ku balecula mu fibi, Ukuti bapusuke.
2. Ububi bwafishe calo, Na mabimbi yaima;
Bambi bali mu cimana, Balefwayo lubuto.
3. Ashe nyali we munyina, tupusushe balefwa;
Kuti bafike ku cabu, Mumfifi bengaluba.
